pages.text: Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui (cai baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui shizhongda de.
Ni shuo:`Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, namo, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.'
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu gezhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin.
Tamen shuo:`Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yongchu,
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he pu tao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian;
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de toushang; huozhe ni qing zhenzhu he zhong tianshen lai (yu women) jianmian;

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.'Ni shuo:`Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.'
Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:`Nandao zhenzhu paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?'
Ni shuo:`Jiaruo dadishang you xuduo tianshen anran buxing, namo wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshen qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.'
Ni shuo:`Zhenzhu zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.'
